settings.feature_service_description: Gas is a finite resource, and increasing reliance on it could contribute to energy insecurity and price volatility in the long term.
Natural gas prices become more volatile, because of various geopolitical, economic, and social changes that the world is experiencing.

Companies that use natural gas may be perceived as contributing to environmental and climate change in comparison with companies that use green energy and that add value and create a good reputation among rivals.

The Dutch government aims to reduce CO2 emissions by a whopping 49/ by 2030. Offsets are a cost and do not have a financial return on investment compared to other operational efficiencies such as on-site solar. which means the price of natural gas and electricity is likely to become more expensive.

settings.accept_text: I agree with the terms and conditions.

settings.description:
Creating Self-sustaining Communities
For you. For your city. For the whole planet

settings.title: Global Warming Reduction
settings.description: With minimal emissions, renewable energy sources offer a solution to reducing global warming. By augmenting their supply, we can substitute carbon-intensive sources and greatly decrease emissions.

settings.title: Improved public health
settings.description: Air and water pollution, the root cause of many health issues, are non-existent with clean energy technologies. These technologies have been estimated to save public health costs of $74.6 billion annually.

settings.title: Inexhaustible energy
settings.description: Renewable energy has been proven time and again to be capable of meeting a significant portion of future electricity demands, even with potential limitations taken into account.

settings.title: Jobs and other economic benefits
settings.description: Renewable energy sources generate more jobs per unit of electricity compared to fossil fuels. Furthermore, the expansion of clean energy can also have positive economic “ripple” effects.

settings.title: Reliability and resilience
settings.description: Solar panels, due to their distributed and modular design, are less susceptible to widespread failure and can function dependably even under conditions that would necessitate shutting down a fossil fuel plant.

settings.title: Stable energy prices
settings.description: Initial investments are necessary to construct renewable facilities, but once in operation, they have low ongoing costs, resulting in stable energy prices over time compared to fossil energy prices.

settings.heading: Additional Advantages
settings.description: Some other public and financial advantages

settings.heading: Welcome to Hoolia Energy
settings.sub-heading: Revolutionizing the industry with its "Distributed DataCenter" based on 100% renewable energy!
settings.content:
With our deepest belief in the concept of circular economy, we have generated a brilliant idea:
Repurpose waste heat from DataCenters to heat Office Buildings, by bringing small “DataCenter modules” running on 100% pure Green Renewable & Recycled Energy!

 

Ending the cycle of Big Centralized DataCenter. It is time to create micro-grid communities and give power back to the people.

 

Watch this video for more information.

settings.Title: We
settings.description: We take care of the entire project, from A to Z, ensuring a seamless process for you.

settings.Title: We
settings.description: We are in charge of all the necessary paperwork and processes to obtain subsidies, including the SDE++ aid provided by the Dutch government, to help maximize your financial benefits.

settings.Title: We
settings.description: We are in charge of all the necessary legal contracts and documentation for the installation of solar panels and machines, as well as renting of the roof, to ensure compliance with regulations.

settings.Title: We
settings.description: We take care of the installation of all necessary devices, such as batteries, HPCs, and solar panels, to help you transit to a more sustainable and efficient energy solution.

settings.Title: You
settings.description: You will enjoy the benefits of your new energy solution, including reduced energy costs and a more sustainable, environmentally-friendly way of generating energy.

settings.Title: Solar panels
settings.discription: Our last generation solar panels that are installed on the roof of the building drastically reduce energy costs, as they can generate electricity during peak demand periods. They are relatively low maintenance, as they do not require any moving parts and have a long lifespan. Also, They can be easily integrated with other renewable energy sources, such as wind and hydropower, to create a more robust and reliable energy system.

settings.Title: Pylontech Batteries
settings.discription:
Our last generation batteries system are modular in design, which enables us to "rack and stack" them in order to scale the nominal capacity of the solar energy storage system.


At 24 kg and 19", these batteries are smaller than the average solar battery in the market, which makes them easy to install and move.

settings.Title: Vaillant allSTOR system
settings.discription:
This multi-function buffer tank gives the possibility to accumulate and distribute any form of heating energy in an entire building. Made of steel with special coating. that makes it resistant to rust.
It is an easy plug-in installation that can connect to different types of input and output sources.

settings.Title: Air conditioning
settings.discription: Hoolia's unique solution allows you to heat your working space through water, but also using air distribution installations. Heating offices via air conditioners is an option chosen by many building owners, that is why we offer you the possibility to keep your employees warmed during winter.

settings.Title: Containers
settings.discription: Some buildings owners may not have the chance to have our datacenter incorporated directly into their offices. That's why we developed a solution. With our external containers, we offer the opportunity to profit of our energy without allocating any space inside the building.

settings.Title: High-Performance Computing
settings.discription:
High-Performance Computing (HPC) is an innovative technology that allows a highly efficient speed and quantity of calculation.
A cooling system, that immerses the equipment in a fluid, is used to reduce energy consumption and decrease maintenance costs.
The fluid used in this technology is non-conductive, for high safety purposes. Also, the heat generated by these computers is the source of energy that will warm your offices either by Water (radiator) or Air (duct).
With its compact size and very low noise production, this system is the discreetest source of energy on the market.

settings.heading: The Installation
settings.description: The material that makes the magic happen

settings.title: Rent
settings.tab-discription: We pay you rent for a corner of your utility room to setup our DataCenter Modules and rent for your roof to place solarpanels. The space you want to allocate for our system can be variable and adapted to your case.

settings.title: Savings
settings.tab-discription: Expect to save about 66% on building heating cost with our green renewable energy system.

settings.title: Subsidy
settings.tab-discription: The government guarantees a success with its SDE++ subsidy offering a guarenteed steady revenue for a much as 15 years if you use a sustainable source of energy. Following this advantage, we propose contracts from 10 to 15 years.

settings.title: Investment
settings.tab-discription:
Become 100% owner of the solar panels after 15 years.

On average, a solarpanel's lifespan is between 25 and 30 years

settings.heading: The Financial Benefits
settings.description: Here is what to expect with our solution

custom_css: h1 {color: #42db44; display: flex; justify-content: center; font-weight: bold; font-size: 4rem;}

settings.text2:
You enjoy free heat and cheap electricity by providing us some space where we can set up shop.
Your rental income: € 30,-/m2 office + € 3,-/m2 roof
I can provide Space

Love what we are doing? Want to be part of it? Then we have a job for you as Site Manager. Earn a salary of up to € 2000,-/maand salary.
I want this Job
We sell our renewable electricity to local businesses for as low as € 0,10/kWh, creating self-sustaining communities.
Everyone is welcome to join our community as an investor. Our expected dividend is 50%.
We sell our recycled heat to local businesses for the lowest market price guaranteed: € 1,-/m3.
The government will guarantee a success by guaranteeing a selling price of € 0,10/kWh guaranteed for 15 years.
